... if you want to create a new item. Required information for new items includes: name, description, area, and stock unit.

Barang akan dibuat jika tidak ditemukan: Item will be created if not found

CV rendah = skor tinggi = lebih konsiste: Low CV = high score = more consistent

Mengabaikan titik data yang dianggap tem: Ignoring data points considered room temperature (below 40°C) to ensure accurate predicted SV, so zone distribution will depend on data length.
Menggunakan semua titik data dan ditempa: Using all data points and placed on standard zone distribution with a fixed data length of 54 minutes.
Mengindikasikan persentase data yang had: Indicates the percentage of data present each hour. Example: If there is data every hour for 21 hours in 1 day, the integrity is 100%. If there is data for only 10.5 hours during 21 hours in 1 day, the integrity is 50%
Mengukur koefisien variasi suhu relatif: Measuring coefficient of temperature variation relative to the mean.
Mengukur seberapa dekat suhu aktual deng: Measuring how close actual temperature is to the set target.
